text: Muteb Mansour Al-Mutairi (; born 1 January 1997) is a Saudi Arabian professional footballer who plays as a left-back for Saudi club Al-Orobah. ==Club career== Muteb Mansour started his career at Al-Batin in the Saudi Professional League, during the 2018–19 season. He made his debut against Al- Nassr. During the 2018–19 season, Mansour helped Al-Batin gain promotion to the Prince Mohammad bin Salman League from the Saudi Professional League. ==References== == External links == * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Al-Batin FC players Category:Al-Orobah FC players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Saudi Second Division players Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Muteb Mansour
